Christopher West wrote:

> I recently got an email from someone who wants to know who the
> samurai statue is outside the imperial palace in tokyo in or near the
> gardens.  the statue is of a samurai on a horse. It's been about 4
> years since I've been there and I don't remember any statue... does
> anyone know who this is a statue of?
>

I believe it's Kusunoki Masashige, a loyalist who died fighting for an
imperial restoration in the 14th Century.
'


Tony
